message: Let's split the money evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to give you a bit more. But let's be reasonable here. I'm not going to give you everything!
Come on, Alice! Meet me in the middle... of the remainder!
Bob, we're both losing money with each round. Let's just split the remaining value as fairly as possible.  This is my final offer.
